abstract: Turkish counterterrorism officials say they have detained two Islamic State militants who were planning to conduct suicide attack in Ankara on New Year's Eve.
lead_paragraph: The pair were plotting a suicide attack on Kizilay Square in Ankara, where crowds gather to usher in the new year, a senior government official said.

headline.main: Turkey Detains 2 ISIS Militants Planning New Year’s Eve Attack
headline.print_headline: Turkey Holds Two in Plot to Attack the Capital

snippet: The pair were plotting a suicide attack on Kizilay Square in Ankara, where crowds gather to usher in the new year, a senior government official said.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
